about.title: About this site
about.body: This is a custom `Kyber API` implementation with an additional functionality such as live updates and conÔ¨Åguration tab. Advanced search and Ô¨Åltering will be implemented later after the Ô¨Årst release. Dark theme included to bring the force balance.

whatAboutKyber.title: About kyber
whatAboutKyber.body: This project based on an open Kyber API. Each API endpoint was reverse engineered, documented and implemented. The resulting implementation is not a competitor of the original site, but more like yet another pet project.

getInvolved.title: Get involved
